ax-headline-widget.widget.json: {"name":"AxHeadlineWidget","description":"Shows a headline, possibly followed by a subtitle and/or buttons.","integration":{"technology":"angular","type":"widget"},"controls":["laxar_uikit/controls/button_list","laxar_uikit/controls/i18n"],"features":{"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","properties":{"headline":{"type":"object","description":"The HTML text to be shown as a headline.","properties":{"i18nHtmlText":{"type":["string","object"],"description":"The (internationalized) HTML headline content."},"level":{"type":"integer","description":"The hierarchical level of the headline (1 to 6).","minimum":1,"maximum":6,"default":1}},"additionalProperties":false},"intro":{"type":"object","description":"Additional introductory HTML text to be shown below the headline.","properties":{"i18nHtmlText":{"type":["string","object"],"description":"The (internationalized) HTML intro content."}},"additionalProperties":false},"buttons":{"type":"array","description":"A list of buttons to be displayed next to the headline, each with individual action and other properties.","default":[],"items":{"type":"object","required":["action"],"additionalProperties":false,"properties":{"enabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Determines if the button is used at all (true) or ignored completely (false).","default":true},"align":{"type":"string","description":"The position relative to the headline.","enum":["LEFT","RIGHT"],"default":"RIGHT"},"index":{"type":"integer","description":"The position at which the button is inserted.","default":0},"i18nHtmlLabel":{"type":["string","object"],"description":"An (internationalized) HTML label to display on the button."},"action":{"type":"string","description":"Topic name of the action to request taking upon button activation.","required":true},"accessKey":{"type":"string","description":"A key (single character) which is used as a shortcut to this button."},"class":{"type":"string","description":"The predefined semantic class that this button belongs to.","enum":["NORMAL","PRIMARY","INFO","SUCCESS","WARNING","DANGER","INVERSE","LINK"],"default":"NORMAL"},"size":{"type":"string","description":"The size of the button on the bar, interpreted according to theme.","enum":["MINI","SMALL","DEFAULT","LARGE"],"default":"DEFAULT"},"hideOn":{"type":"array","description":"List of flags. Setting any of these causes the button to be hidden from view, unsetting any reverses the effect. Space for the button is reserved in either state.","items":{"type":"string"}},"disableOn":{"type":"array","description":"List of flags. Setting any of these causes the button to be disabled ('greyed out'), unsetting any reverses the effect.","items":{"type":"string"}},"omitOn":{"type":"array","description":"List of flags. Setting any of these causes the button to be removed from the layout, unsetting any reverses the effect. Other buttons may claim this button's space while it is omitted.","items":{"type":"string"}},"busyOn":{"type":"array","description":"List of flags. Setting any of these causes the button (icon) to indicate a busy state, unsetting any reverses the effect.","items":{"type":"string"}}}}},"buttonArea":{"type":"object","description":"Additional introductory HTML text to be shown below the headline.","properties":{"align":{"type":"string","description":"The position of the buttons. Either on the left side of the headline or on the right side.","enum":["LEFT","RIGHT"]}}},"i18n":{"description":"Which locale to use for displaying this widget.","type":"object","properties":{"locale":{"type":"string","description":"The topic under which to expect the locale for this widget.","default":"default"}}}}}}

ax-html-display-widget.widget.json: {"name":"AxHtmlDisplayWidget","description":"Sanitizes and displays HTML content from a resource.","integration":{"technology":"angular","type":"widget"},"compatibility":["json-patch"],"controls":["laxar_uikit/controls/i18n"],"features":{"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","properties":{"content":{"type":"object","required":["resource"],"properties":{"resource":{"type":"string","description":"The resource topic by which the HTML content is identified."},"attribute":{"type":"string","default":"","description":"The attribute path within the resource that leads to the (i18n) HTML content."}},"additionalProperties":false},"i18n":{"description":"Which locale to use for displaying this widget.","type":"object","properties":{"locale":{"type":"string","description":"The topic under which to expect the locale for this widget.","default":"default"}}}}}}

ax-markdown-display-widget.widget.json: {"name":"AxMarkdownDisplayWidget","description":"Obtains Markdown-formatted text or a reference to it from a resource and displays it as HTML.","version":{"spec":"1.4"},"integration":{"technology":"angular","type":"widget"},"compatibility":["json-patch"],"features":{"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","required":["markdown"],"properties":{"markdown":{"type":"object","description":"Tells how to obtain the Markdown-formatted text.","required":["parameter"],"properties":{"parameter":{"type":"string","description":"The place parameter for the flow definition to support anchors.","format":"topic"},"resource":{"type":"string","description":"The resource topic under which Markdown-formatted text is expected or a URL which references to a file with Markdown-formatted text.","format":"topic"},"attribute":{"type":"string","description":"Path to the actual Markdown-formatted text","format":"topic"},"url":{"type":"string","description":"The URL which refers to a Markdown-formatted text."}}},"messages":{"type":"object","description":"Configuration of messages published via didEncounterError or didValidate events.","properties":{"i18nFailedLoadingResource":{"type":["object","string"],"description":"The message to publish when a GET for a Markdown-formatted text source fails. [url] is replaced by the URL.","default":{"en_US":"Could not load resource from \"[url]\"","de_DE":"Die Ressource konnte nicht von \"[url]\" geladen werden."}}}},"i18n":{"description":"Which locale to use for displaying this widget.","type":"object","properties":{"locale":{"type":"string","description":"The topic under which to expect the locale for this widget.","default":"default"}}}}}}

default.theme.ax-media-widget.html:
{{ model.medium.name }}

{{ model.medium.description }}

ax-media-widget.widget.json: {"name":"AxMediaWidget","description":"Displays an image or an external website.","integration":{"technology":"angular","type":"widget"},"controls":["laxar_uikit/controls/i18n"],"compatibility":["json-patch"],"features":{"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","required":["medium"],"properties":{"medium":{"type":"object","description":"Identifies which media content to display.","required":["resource"],"properties":{"resource":{"type":"string","description":"A resource topic under which a document resource can be obtained."},"showTitle":{"type":"boolean","description":"If available, show a title above the media content.","default":false},"showCaption":{"type":"boolean","description":"If available, show a caption below the media content.","default":false},"onActions":{"type":["string","array"],"description":"List of actions, any of which triggers loading media content. If omitted, content is loaded immediately. Using a string is DEPRECATED. An array should be used.","items":{"type":"string","description":"An action that triggers loading media content."}}},"additionalProperties":false},"layout":{"type":"object","description":"Tells how the display size is calculated.","properties":{"sizeToContent":{"type":"boolean","description":"If true, the media content determines the rendering size (container otherwise).","default":false}},"additionalProperties":false},"fallback":{"type":"object","description":"Allow to open content in a new browser-window on specific platforms.","properties":{"i18nHtmlText":{"type":["string","object"],"description":"Text to display on the fallback-link.","default":{"en_US":"Please click here to display the document!","de_DE":"Bitte klicken, um das Dokument anzuzeigen!"}}}},"integration":{"type":"object","description":"Allow to integrate with embedded websites (applicable to website mime-types only).","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"The window.name that is visible to any embedded website.","default":null}},"additionalProperties":false},"i18n":{"description":"Which locale to use for displaying this widget.","type":"object","properties":{"locale":{"type":"string","description":"The topic under which to expect the locale for this widget.","default":"default"}}}}}}

ax-messages-widget.widget.json: {"name":"AxMessagesWidget","description":"Displays messages to the user, for example to communicate validation results.","integration":{"technology":"angular","type":"widget"},"compatibility":["json-patch"],"features":{"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","properties":{"layout":{"type":"object","description":"How to present the messages.","properties":{"variant":{"type":"integer","description":"A layout-variant code (preliminary; 1: no alert/border, 2: single alert, 3: one alert per error-class, 4: one alert per message).","default":3}}},"dismiss":{"type":"object","description":"Tells if and how messages may be dismissed by the user.","properties":{"enabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"If true, a button for dismissing is provided to the user.","default":true}}},"status":{"type":"object","description":"Flags by which the most severe level among all messages is indicated.","properties":{"ERROR":{"type":"string","default":"messageStatus-ERROR"},"WARNING":{"type":"string","default":"messageStatus-WARNING"},"INFO":{"type":"string","default":"messageStatus-INFO"},"SUCCESS":{"type":"string","default":"messageStatus-SUCCESS"},"BLANK":{"type":"string","default":"messageStatus-BLANK"},"reset":{"type":"object","description":"Delete all messages and set the state to BLANK","properties":{"onActions":{"type":"array","description":"List with actions"}}}}},"errors":{"type":"object","description":"If enabled, errors received via didEncounterError will be displayed too","properties":{"enabled":{"type":"boolean","default":true}}},"resource":{"type":"object","description":"List of resources for which publish- and validation-messages are processed.","properties":{"list":{"type":["array","null"],"description":"Resource topic list. Empty list serves as catch-all, null disables the resource-feature.","default":null,"items":{"type":"string"}},"exclude":{"type":"array","description":"A list of resources to exclude from the display in case resource.list is set to catch-all.","items":{"type":"string"}},"replace":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether to replace messages with success message.","default":false}}},"i18n":{"description":"Which locale to use for displaying this widget.","type":"object","properties":{"locale":{"type":"string","description":"The topic under which to expect the locale for this widget.","default":"default"}}}}}}

ax-artifact-repository-link-widget.widget.json: {"name":"AxArtifactRepositoryLinkWidget","description":"The AxArtifactRepositoryLinkWidget displays a link to the repository of a dynamic widget.","integration":{"technology":"angular","type":"widget"},"compatibility":["json-patch"],"features":{"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","properties":{"display":{"type":"object","properties":{"resource":{"type":"string","format":"topic","description":"The topic of the resource with content of a bower.json."},"i18nHtmlText":{"type":["string","object"],"description":"The (internationalized) HTML link text.","default":"Browse artifact repository"}}}}}}

ax-widget-browser-widget.widget.json: {"name":"AxWidgetBrowserWidget","description":"The WidgetBrowserWidget displays a list of all widget and activities and lets the user select one.","integration":{"technology":"angular","type":"widget"},"features":{"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","required":["list"],"properties":{"list":{"type":"object","description":"Display a selectable list of widgets and activities received through a resource.","required":["resource"],"properties":{"title":{"default":{"htmlLabel":"Widgets"},"type":"object","properties":{"htmlLabel":{"type":"string","description":"Title for the selectable list."}}},"resource":{"type":"string","description":"The topic of the resource with the list.","format":"topic"}}},"select":{"type":"object","description":"Select a widget from the list and publish resources with data of the selected widget.","required":["parameter"],"properties":{"parameter":{"type":"string","description":"The place parameter for the flow definition.","format":"topic"},"parameterList":{"type":"array","description":"A list with place parameters which are overwritten with an empty string.","default":[],"items":{"type":"string","description":"A place parameter to reset.","format":"topic"}},"information":{"type":"object","properties":{"resource":{"type":"string","description":"The topic of the resource with the widget.json content.","format":"topic"}}},"bower":{"type":"object","properties":{"resource":{"type":"string","description":"The topic of the resource with the bower.json content.","format":"topic"}}},"documentation":{"type":"object","properties":{"resource":{"type":"string","description":"The topic of the resource with the documentation markdown url.","format":"topic"},"sources":{"type":"array","description":"A list with files with markdown text to use as source for the documentation resource.","default":["README.md","SPECIFICATION.md"],"items":{"type":"string","description":"A filename to search for a file with markdown text."}}}},"testRunner":{"type":"object","properties":{"resource":{"type":"string","description":"The topic of the resource with the url to the test runner.","format":"topic"}}}}}}}}

ax-widget-information-widget.widget.json: {"name":"AxWidgetInformationWidget","description":"The AxWidgetInformationWidget presents details of a widget or activity.","integration":{"technology":"angular","type":"widget"},"compatibility":["json-patch"],"features":{"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","required":["widget"],"properties":{"widget":{"type":"object","description":"Display information from a resource with the data of a widget.json.","required":["resource"],"properties":{"resource":{"type":"string","description":"The topic of the resource with content of a widget.json.","format":"topic"}}},"bower":{"type":"object","description":"Display version and dependencies of a widget from a resource with the data of a bower.json.","required":["resource"],"properties":{"resource":{"type":"string","description":"The topic of the resource with content of a bower.json.","format":"topic"}}}}}}

ax-widget-listing-activity.widget.json: {"name":"AxWidgetListingActivity","description":"Reads a file listing and extracts information on available widgets and activities.","integration":{"technology":"angular","type":"activity"},"compatibility":["json-patch"],"features":{"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","required":["widgetListing","fileListing"],"properties":{"fileListing":{"type":"object","description":"Extract widget information from a file listing.","properties":{"resource":{"type":"string","description":"The name of a resource containing the application url and the path to the file listing as provided by the directory tree grunt task."},"list":{"type":"array","description":"A list with json files which contain information about used widgets.","default":["var/listing/includes_resources.json"],"items":{"type":"string"}},"applicationUrl":{"type":"string","description":"The url of the application with the widgets. Default is the application in which the activity is included."}}},"widgetListing":{"type":"object","required":["resource"],"description":"Provide a list of available widgets and activities as a resource.","properties":{"resource":{"type":"string","description":"The list resource topic."}}}}}}
